commands.reply: Script Stack Underflow (SSU) is glitch in speedrunning of GTA Vice City that allows users to jump to an abritrary location in the games mission scripts. No SSU is a categroty of speedrunning with allows for any other glitch exectp for SSU

Sliding is a method in GTA Vice City to move faster than walking, but slower than runnning. It is carried out by interrupting your character Tommy's animiation of moving, by playing a replay. It can be done whilsit unarmed or with some weapons such as a chainsaw
The radio is turned off as speedruns require recording, and this means that we can't have the radio on due to music copyright
The current GTA Vice City Any% No SSU world record is 47:57 by Redopter. The leaderboard can be found at https://www.speedrun.com/gtavc?h=Any_No_SSU&x=nxd1rk8q

In Vice City replays can be made during the game. In speedruns the main use of replays is that if you make a replay over a marker such as a gun, a rampage marker, or a clothes replay when you play that replay, you will interact with the object in the replay
Vice City is being run on PC
commands.description: What system is the game being run on

commands.reply: The game is being run using the Japanese version of the game, as it has differences in the game scripts. This means that you can instantly pass (or intapass) certain missions, which cant be done on other versions of Vice City
commands.description: What system is the game being run on
